name: Fate/Stay Night
description: Fan-produced "Ultimate Edition" for the Windows version of Fate/stay night [Réalta Nua] courtesy the Beast's Lair forum. This installer is the definitive Fate/stay night experience on Linux, aggregating all prior content (including PS2 and Vita assets, the three Windows routes, and all fan patches) into a single cohesive launcher.
notes:
Detailed instructions for installing all dependencies required by this installer (as well as outstanding issues and pull requests) reside at this GitHub repository:
    https://github.com/leycec/fsnrnue

task.executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate／stay night [Réalta Nua] Ultimate Edition Setup.exe
task.description: Installing Fate/stay night [Realta Nua] Ultimate Edition...
task.name: wineexec

files.game_ub_crack: N/A:Select source file "Unlimited Blade Works Crack.rar"

content:
files:
- ultimate_edition: https://github.com/leycec/fsnrnue/releases/download/2019.03.19/fsnrnue-2019.03.19-32.zip
- lav_filters: https://github.com/Nevcairiel/LAVFilters/releases/download/0.74.1/LAVFilters-0.74.1-Installer.exe
- game_fa: N/A:Select source file "Fate.rar"
- game_fa_crack: N/A:Select source file "Fate Crack.rar"
- game_hf: N/A:Select source file "Heaven's Feel.7z"
- game_hf_crack: N/A:Select source file "Heaven's Feel Crack.rar"
- game_ub: N/A:Select source file "Unlimited Blade Works.rar"
- game_ub_crack: N/A:Select source file "Unlimited Blade Works Crack.rar"
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta Nua] Ultimate Edition/Fate.exe"
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files
    file: ultimate_edition
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Fate-"
    file: game_fa
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Fate-"
    file: game_fa_crack
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Heaven's\
      \ Feel-"
    file: game_hf
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Heaven's\
      \ Feel-"
    file: game_hf_crack
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Unlimited\
      \ Blade Works-"
    file: game_ub
- extract:
    dst: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night[Realta nua] -Unlimited\
      \ Blade Works-"
    file: game_ub_crack
- task:
    app: d3dx9 quartz vcrun2015 win7
    arch: win32
    description: Installing winetricks-based dependencies...
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing LAVFilters-based DirectShow emulation...
    executable: lav_filters
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Fate/stay night [Realta Nua] Ultimate Edition...
    executable: "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Fate\uFF0Fstay night [R\xE9alta Nua]\
      \ Ultimate Edition Setup.exe"
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
